about_the_game:
About ZAHAK

Dive into the enchanting realm of Persian mythology in this roguelike action RPG survivors game. In ZAHAK, you embody the descendant of the infamous Zahak (the Serpent King), venturing through the enigmatic Mount Damavand to face the dark legacy left by your ancestor. Each run represents a new challenge in our heros eternal struggle to break free from Zahak's dark influence. Encounter a pantheon of deities, each adding a layer to the rich tapestry of the game's world. ZAHAK also features engaging co-op multiplayer, allowing you to team up with friends online or on the couch.

Key Features:

A game base on Persian Mythology:
- Experience the mystique of Persian mythology—an underrepresented gem in gaming lore. Engage with stories, heroes, and deities rooted in rich cultural narratives that set the stage for a holistic and authentic gameplay experience.

Deep And Engaging Gameplay :
- Dive into gameplay that draws inspiration from the popular "Vampire Survivors" genre. Expect intense action and strategic depth as you navigate waves of enemies and progress through engaging levels.

Striking Visual Blend:
- Experience the allure of beautifully hand-painted isometric 2D environments enhanced by the Unreal Engine 5 's advanced lighting and particle effect systems.

Engaging Multiplayer Experience
- Play ZAHAK with friends either online or on the couch. As they say playing with friends makes every game better :)

Story:


The story of "ZAHAK" is deeply rooted in Persian mythology and unfolds through interactive dialogues and environmental storytelling.

The narrative centers around Zahak, a noble prince who, under the deceit of Ahriman (the devil in Persian mythology), transforms into a symbol of tyranny and chaos. Players assume the role of a descendant from Zahak's cursed lineage, embarking on a journey through the mystical Mount Damavand to confront and possibly end the reign of their forefather. Each run in the game represents a new generation's challenge to end Zahak's reign, weaving a tale of heroism and the eternal struggle against a dark past.

Along the way, they interact with a pantheon of Persian deities and discover the intricate interplay between gods, mortals, and the ever-present shadow of Ahriman's deceit.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 8 or higher
  • Processor: 1.4GHz or faster, SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 290X
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K or AMD Ryzen 7 2700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 or AMD RX 580
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: ZAHAK is a roguelike action RPG survivors game set in the captivating world of Persian mythology. Battle relentless waves of enemies and navigate the magical landscapes of Mount Damavand. Unleash the ancient power within your cursed bloodline to challenge the dark legacy of the Serpent King.
